title: MT5 user main password reset
description: This call changes main password for MT5 user

new_password.description: New password of the account (length within 8-25 chars, accepts any printable ASCII character).

verification_code.description: Email verification code (received from a verify_email call, which must be done first)

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
